name: llamafarm
description: LlamaFarm project management, RAG queries, AI chat, anomaly detection, text classification, OCR, NER, reranking, and streaming ML. Provides tools for managing projects, querying vector databases, interacting with AI models, and running ML workloads.

prerequisites: LlamaFarm services must be running (use /start or `lf start`)

provided.name: list_projects
provided.description: List all LlamaFarm projects in a namespace

provided.name: create_project
provided.description: Create a new LlamaFarm project with configuration

provided.name: get_project
provided.description: Get project details and configuration

provided.name: update_project
provided.description: Update project settings

provided.name: delete_project
provided.description: Remove a project

provided.name: chat_completions
provided.description: Send messages to AI models with optional RAG context

provided.name: rag_query
provided.description: Query documents in vector databases

provided.name: list_models
provided.description: Get available AI models from configuration

provided.name: list_datasets
provided.description: List datasets in a project

provided.name: process_dataset
provided.description: Trigger dataset ingestion pipeline

provided.name: anomaly_fit
provided.description: Train an anomaly detection model on a dataset

provided.name: anomaly_detect
provided.description: Run anomaly detection on new data using a trained model

provided.name: anomaly_score
provided.description: Score data points for anomaly likelihood

provided.name: anomaly_models
provided.description: List trained anomaly detection models

provided.name: anomaly_stream
provided.description: Send data to a streaming anomaly detector

provided.name: anomaly_stream_status
provided.description: Get status of a streaming anomaly detector

provided.name: classify_text
provided.description: Zero-shot text classification with candidate labels

provided.name: classifier_fit
provided.description: Train a custom text classifier using SetFit

provided.name: classifier_predict
provided.description: Predict labels using a trained classifier

provided.name: classifier_models
provided.description: List trained text classification models

provided.name: ocr_extract
provided.description: Extract text from images and documents using OCR

provided.name: ner_extract
provided.description: Extract named entities from text

provided.name: rerank
provided.description: Rerank search results for relevance

provided.name: polars_buffer_create
provided.description: Create a Polars buffer for feature engineering

provided.name: polars_buffer_features
provided.description: Compute rolling features from a Polars buffer
